title: Scottrade learned about a data breach from law enforcement
text:
Scottrade learned about a data breach from law enforcement 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Companies typically find out about data breaches first-hand, and bring in the police after the fact to (hopefully) identify the culprits. Un...
